page.title: 08Leisure Time Activities.
page.content: The people of Stainforth take part in a variety of sports and leisure activities.Clubs and Societies exist for Swimming,Golf,Football,Cycling, Fell Walking,Judo,at both junior and senior levels. There are several Working Men's Clubs which cater especially for the adult men and women in the village.Youths and children have a Youth Club as well as Scouts and Guides,and St. John's Ambulance Cadets.Special interests are catered for by the Womens Institute,the National Housewives Register and various Allotment and Gardening Clubs.The Local Labour Party has a branch in Stainforth.
